---
title: "patient-link.ts"
---

## High-level description
The code defines TypeScript types for representing the status of a patient link across different Health Information Exchanges (HIEs). It includes an enum for individual HIE link statuses and a type for storing statuses across multiple HIEs.

## Code Structure
The `LinkStatus` type defines possible statuses for a single HIE link. The `LinkStatusAcrossHIEs` type uses `LinkStatus` to represent the status for each HIE, keyed by the `MedicalDataSource` enum.

## References
- `MedicalDataSource`: An enum from `@metriport/core/external/index` representing different HIEs.

## Symbols

### `LinkStatus`
#### Description
An enum defining the possible statuses of a patient link to a specific HIE.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| completed | string | Indicates the link is successfully established. |
| processing | string | Indicates the link is in progress. |
| failed | string | Indicates the link attempt failed. |

### `LinkStatusAcrossHIEs`
#### Description
A type representing the link status of a patient across multiple HIEs. It uses a dictionary-like structure where keys are `MedicalDataSource` values and values are `LinkStatus` strings.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| \{ [k in MedicalDataSource]: LinkStatus \} | object | An object where keys are HIEs (`MedicalDataSource`) and values are their corresponding link statuses (`LinkStatus`). |

## Dependencies
- `@metriport/core/external/index`: Provides the `MedicalDataSource` enum.
